Package client.guiControls.adminMain.organisationalUnitsController

Class OrganisationalUnitsController

java.lang.Object
client.guiControls.DisplayController
client.guiControls.adminMain.organisationalUnitsController.OrganisationalUnitsController
public class OrganisationalUnitsController
extends DisplayController
A controller to control the ORGANISATIONAL UNITS Page (which allows the admin to add / remove or edit organisationalUnits' information).

      public <T extends IData> Response sendRequest​(java.lang.String action, T attachment, java.lang.Class<T> attachmentType) throws InvalidArgumentValueException
      Description copied from class: DisplayController
      Pass the request to the mainController and in turns, be sent to the database.
      Overrides:
      sendRequest in class DisplayController
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the attachment.
      Parameters:
      action - The request action "query", "add", "edit", "delete"
      attachment - The attachment related to the request.
      attachmentType - The type of the attachment that can be read.

      Throws:
